p: The plants from conservation units were identified as A. rosiodora by Dr João B. Baitello (Instituto Florestal do Estado de São Paulo) and the vouchers (44874 and 44888, respectively, for RESEX and FLONA) were deposited in Herbário Dom Bento Pickel (Herbarium SPSF) in the Instituto Florestal do Estado de São Paulo, Brazil. Additional samples and species from other locations were analyzed to compare chemical profiles: A. rosiodora (voucher Kato 1193) from Presidente Figueiredo, AM (S 2°02’46.2”/W 59°58’05.8”), and A. parviflora from Fazenda Curauá, Santarém, PA (S 02°34’15”/W 54°37’08”). These were deposited in the herbarium of the Empresa Brasileira de Pesquisa Agropecuária (EMBRAPA, Herbarium IAN, Belém, PA) (voucher IAN 84897).
